entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
